title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6500.3 - Eligibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6500.3 - Eligibility

State Regulations

Consideration for the allocation of awards shall be given
to institutions of higher education within the State which satisfactorily
demonstrate: (a) a specific need for
such funds; and
(b) the manner in
which such award would enhance the research capabilities and reputation of the
respective academic institution. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6500.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
